alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 7:03AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A line of strong showers will impact portions of central Lincoln, southern Fairfield, Newberry, northwestern Edgefield, northern Saluda and McCormick Counties through 745 AM EST... At 702 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Newberry County Airport to near Nancy Hart State Park. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newberry, Winnsboro, VC Summer Nuclear Station, Saluda, McCormick, Lincolnton, Prosperity, Jenkinsville, Elijah Clark State Park, Monticello, Newberry College, Mccormick County Airport, Newberry County Airport, Lake Strom Thurmond, Bobby Brown State Park, Lake Greenwood, Little Mountain, Pomaria, Bradley and Silverstreet. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 67 and 89. Interstate 77 between mile markers 38 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
